LEVEL 27
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 27
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, May 15, 2002 - 12:34 am:

LEVEL 27

Here People we have come this far in search of the legendary phoenix.

At the start of the stage,go all the way right and take the big fireworks.(It'll assist you when you have troubles)Than go back to all the way left. Move one step right,and facing left create a box there.Destroy all boxes that block your way,and stand on the box that you've just created.
Create a box on your right and jump on it,and facing left,create another box,and destroy the box on your underneath right,repeat this process until you reach the highest box which the rolling red monsters fall from,DON'T DESTROY THE BOX,AS THE MONSTER WILL FALL ON YOU AND KILL YOU,AND DESTROY THE BOXES ON THE RIGHT OR THEY WILL ROLL ON YOU,KILLING you. Once after the monster's gone,and the boxes on the right destroyed,create boxes on your right and destroy that blue flame box,the flame will than fall down. Create in place another box where the blue flame used to stand and stand on it,destroying the blocks which you stand on last time,as the monsters will stand on it,which will be connected to your current box and kill you. You should create another box on your right,below the metal blocka,and stand on it,if there are no monsters,quickly go and create a box and rush to destroy the rightenmost box and the monster will fall into it,after the monster die,quickly go take the key and get outta there FAST.and make your way to win.
